TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1016
TEI.2.document_title: Rawson Alley to Stephen F. Austin, 01-11-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Rawson Alley to Austin, January 11, 1825. Land business.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1016

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Rawson Alley to Austin, January 11, 1825. Land business.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I send you the returns, of the *location_mentioned*Land below Eagle Lake*/location_mentioned* with the amount of the Surveying of Each League Set down on the back of the return, which I would be glad you would receive, if the *person_mentioned*locaters*/person_mentioned* have property that suits you, and credit my account with the same. I was mistaken some in the Quantity of Land in the *location_mentioned*13th and 14th Leagues */location_mentioned*there was no more than the common Quantity with out takeing in the *location_mentioned*Lake*/location_mentioned* and a Larger portion of the *location_mentioned*prairie*/location_mentioned* than usual give *person_mentioned*Andrew */person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Thomas Rabb*/person_mentioned* their Deeds if they want them I have made an arrangement for the Surveying with them if they want to know the amount of Surveying $129 is the amount of the *location_mentioned*8th and 9th Leagues */location_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*R. Alley*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]
*/p* */div1*
